channel.title: Comments on: Automatically subscribe to Buddypress group forum

item.title: By: simeaulrich
item.dc:creator: simeaulrich
item.description: That's really nice, you just saved me a lot of time! Is there a way to do the same for unsubscribe? Like when I leave a group also unsubscribe the forum?
item.content:encoded: Thatâ€™s really nice, you just saved me a lot of time! Is there a way to do the same for unsubscribe? Like when I leave a group also unsubscribe the forum?

item.title: By: olufemishield

item.description: Hi, thanks a lot for this.
